name: bor-attila/cakephp-file-uploader
description: Just another file upload plugin for CakePHP

suggest.league/flysystem-aws-s3-v3: Required to upload files to AWS S3 bucket
suggest.league/flysystem-azure-blob-storage: Required to upload files to MS Azure container
suggest.league/flysystem-google-cloud-storage: Required to upload files to Google Cloud container
suggest.appwrite/php-clamav: Required if you want to scan uploaded files with ClamAV
